newGuild.title: {{botUsername}} added successfully!
newGuild.description:
Use the configuration files to adjust the bot to your liking.
Remember that the bot will only be able to moderate those people who have a role below the role created by {{botUser}}.
If you need help, you can [check the wiki](https://github.com/EasyXploit/HelpBot/wiki/Configuration)

splashLogo.description: I'm a bot designed for automated community moderation, leveling, chat utilities, and much more!
